metadata.title: CVE-2016-0805 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The performance event manager for Qualcomm ARM processors in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49G, and 6.x before 2016-02-01 allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug25773204.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
